import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form ,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' const CreatScreen = () => { const [name , setName] = useState("") const [email , setEmail] = useState("") const [password , setPassword] = useState("") console.log(name) return (
Name setName(e.target.value) }/> Enter your name Email address setEmail(e.target.value) } /> We'll never share your email with anyone else. Password setPassword(e.target.value) } />
) } export default CreatScreen
